prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of an (emaciated Indian ascetic:1.3), visible bone structure, skull necklace, serene expression, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: extremely detailed aged weathered skin, (prominent skeletal structure:1.2), (cracked red face paint texture:1.3), source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching aged bone texture on necklace:1.2), natural sunset lighting, film grain, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, muscular, fat, healthy skin, smooth skin, low quality, vibrant colors, gore
